description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Game of Hockey is an update to an old classic.  In this game, the player controls the left two paddles and tries to guard his or her goal from the puck while trying to bounce the puck into the computer's goal.  This game features ability to have up to 4 players play at one time in teams of two.
